method.name: getFile
method.description: * Returns the file for this dependency. * * @return The file for this dependency.

method.name: getGradleModuleVersion
method.description: * Returns the Gradle module information for this dependency, or {@code null} if the dependency does not * originate from a remote repository. * * @return The Gradle module information for this dependency, or {@code null} if the dependency does not * originate from a remote repository. * @since 1.1

method.name: getJavadoc
method.description: * Returns the Javadoc directory or archive for this dependency, or {@code null} if no Javadoc is available. * * @return the Javadoc directory or archive for this dependency, or {@code null} if no Javadoc is available.

method.name: getSource
method.description: * Returns the source directory or archive for this dependency, or {@code null} if no source is available. * * @return The source directory or archive for this dependency, or {@code null} if no source is available.

method.name: isExported
method.description: * Marks this dependency as exported. * * @return whether this dependency needs to be exported. * @since 2.5

property.name: exported
property.description: * Marks this dependency as exported. * * @return whether this dependency needs to be exported. * @since 2.5

property.name: file
property.description: * Returns the file for this dependency. * * @return The file for this dependency.

property.name: gradleModuleVersion
property.description: * Returns the Gradle module information for this dependency, or {@code null} if the dependency does not * originate from a remote repository. * * @return The Gradle module information for this dependency, or {@code null} if the dependency does not * originate from a remote repository. * @since 1.1

property.name: javadoc
property.description: * Returns the Javadoc directory or archive for this dependency, or {@code null} if no Javadoc is available. * * @return the Javadoc directory or archive for this dependency, or {@code null} if no Javadoc is available.

property.name: source
property.description: * Returns the source directory or archive for this dependency, or {@code null} if no source is available. * * @return The source directory or archive for this dependency, or {@code null} if no source is available.
